title: Fat chips with cheese fondue

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Place the potato chips onto a baking tray. Drizzle with the olive oil and sprinkle with the paprika. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Place into the preheated oven and cook for 15 minutes.
Heat the double cream in a saucepan. Add the cheese, mustard and cumin and cook until the cheese melts.
Serve the fondue with the fat chips.
